com.netflix.spectator.api

Class AbstractRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.spectator.api.AbstractRegistry
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Registry, Iterable<Meter>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultRegistry

    public abstract class AbstractRegistry
extends Object
implements Registry
    Base class to make it easier to implement a simple registry that only needs to customise the types returned for Counter, DistributionSummary, and Timer calls.

        Description copied from interface: Registry

        Specified by:
